Package org.loboevolution.html.renderer

Contains

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BoundableRenderable
    A renderer node with well-defined bounds.
    FloatingBoundsSource  
    FrameContext
    Provides direct access to the GUI component where the document is rendered, typically a browser frame of some sort.
    NodeRenderer
    NodeRenderer interface.
    RCollection
    A Renderable with children.
    RElement
    A renderer node for elements such as blocks, lists, tables, inputs, images, etc.
    Renderable
    Represents a renderer (view) node.
    RenderableContainer
    A RenderableContainer is either usually a parent block or the root GUI component.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseElementRenderable
    Abstract BaseElementRenderable class.
    BrokenComponent
    BrokenComponent class.
    DelayedPair
    DelayedPair class.
    ExportableFloat
    ExportableFloat class.
    HtmlController
    HtmlController class.
    LineBreak
    LineBreak class.
    ParentFloatingBoundsSource
    ParentFloatingBoundsSource class.
    PositionedRenderable
    PositionedRenderable class.
    RBlock
    Represents a HTML block in a rendered document, typically a DIV.
    RBlockScroll
    RBlockScroll class.
    RBlockViewport
    A substantial portion of the HTML rendering logic of the package can be found in this class.
    RenderableSpot
    Contains a renderer node and a position in that node.
    RFlex
    RFlex class.
    RInlineBlock
    RInlineBlock class.
    RLayout
    RLayout class.
    RLayout.BlockLayout  
    RLayout.BrLayout  
    RLayout.ButtonLayout  
    RLayout.CanvasLayout  
    RLayout.CommonLayout  
    RLayout.CommonWidgetLayout
    This is layout common to elements that render themselves, except RBlock, RTable and RList.
    RLayout.IFrameLayout  
    RLayout.ImgLayout  
    RLayout.InLineLayout  
    RLayout.InputLayout  
    RLayout.ListItemLayout  
    RLayout.MiscLayout  
    RLayout.NopLayout  
    RLayout.NoScriptLayout  
    RLayout.ObjectLayout  
    RLayout.PLayout  
    RLayout.RSSLayout  
    RLayout.SelectLayout  
    RLayout.SVGLayout  
    RLayout.TableCellLayout  
    RLayout.TableLayout  
    RLayout.TableRowLayout  
    RLayout.TextAreaLayout  
    RRectangle  
    TranslatedRenderable
    TranslatedRenderable class.
    ZIndexComparator
    ZIndexComparator class.

Package org.loboevolution.html.renderer Description

Contains the HTML renderer infrastructure.
